channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Sliderby10Web
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Sliderby10Web

item.title: CVE-2022-4197|2024-08-03T01:34:49.676Z -- unknown -- sliderby10web
item.description: The Sliderby10Web WordPress plugin before 1.2.53 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
